job.name: TpcRS
job.command: # source ~/.tcshrc cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} setenv NODEBUG yes starver .DEV2 # setup gcc451 set file = $INPUTFILE0; echo "${file}" set logFile = ${file}B.log set f=`find . -maxdepth 1 -type f -name "*${file}*.root"` set vers = `basename ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY}` echo "Use version $vers" if ("$f" == "") then # root4star -q -b 'TpcRS.C(100,"devT,useXgeom,TpcRS,phys_off,Sti",0,"Bichsel,'${file}'")' >& ${logFile} root4star -q -b 'TpcRS.C(20,"'${vers}',TpcRS,phys_off,StiCA",0,"Bichsel,'${file}'")' >& ${logFile} endif
